meanings.definition: The state or quality of being podgy; plumpness or roundness in shape.
meanings.sent1: Her podginess made her look cute and chubby.
meanings.sent2: The baby's podginess was adorable to everyone who saw him.
meanings.sent3: Despite her podginess, she was surprisingly agile and quick on her feet.
meanings.sent4: The podginess of the teddy bear made it the perfect cuddle companion.
meanings.sent5: The podginess of the pumpkin made it stand out among the other vegetables.

meanings.sent1: The podginess waddled happily down the street.
meanings.sent2: The cat's podginess made it a favorite among the neighborhood kids.
meanings.sent3: The podginess in the mirror seemed to wink back at him mischievously.
meanings.sent4: Her podginess was like a walking marshmallow, soft and huggable.
meanings.sent5: The podginess of the snowman made it the star of the winter festival.
